quote: It was just learned that one of the closest people to Hillary Clinton, with long-standing ties to her husband and herself gave more — this just came out — gave more than $675,000 to the campaign of the spouse — the wife — of the top FBI official who helped oversee the investigation into Mrs. Clinton's illegal email server. So the man that was investigating her from the FBI, his wife runs for office and they give her more than $675,000 to run.
quotePlain: It was just learned that one of the closest people to Hillary Clinton, with long-standing ties to her husband and herself gave more — this just came out — gave more than $675,000 to the campaign of the spouse — the wife — of the top FBI official who helped oversee the investigation into Mrs. Clinton’s illegal email server. So the man that was investigating her from the FBI, his wife runs for office and they give her more than $675,000 to run.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: By getting the timeline wrong and exaggerating the connections, Trump ends up in Three-Pinocchio range. But then, as he often does, Trump pushes the envelope and makes the unsupported claim that Clinton knew about the payments. It’s almost like he can’t help himself. That tips his statement about the Wall Street Journal article into Four-Pinocchio territory.
checks.quotePlain: By getting the timeline wrong and exaggerating the connections, Trump ends up in Three-Pinocchio range. But then, as he often does, Trump pushes the envelope and makes the unsupported claim that Clinton knew about the payments. It’s almost like he can’t help himself. That tips his statement about the Wall Street Journal article into Four-Pinocchio territory.

checks.quote: But for Trump's suggestion of a conspiracy to be true, McAuliffe and the Clintons would have had to hatch the scheme to buy favor with the FBI via Andrew McCabe by convincing his wife to run for office some five months before it was [first reported](https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/fbi-looks-into-security-of-clintons-private-e-mail-setup/2015/08/04/2bdd85ec-3aae-11e5-8e98-115a3cf7d7ae_story.html?postshare=2371438737933018) that the FBI was investigating whether Clinton mishandled classified information. Nor would it be known that such an investigation would be conducted out of Washington, not New York, since that was where the offending server was located.
checks.quotePlain: But for Trump’s suggestion of a conspiracy to be true, McAuliffe and the Clintons would have had to hatch the scheme to buy favor with the FBI via Andrew McCabe by convincing his wife to run for office some five months before it was first reported that the FBI was investigating whether Clinton mishandled classified information. Nor would it be known that such an investigation would be conducted out of Washington, not New York, since that was where the offending server was located.

claims.title: Hillary Clinton gave almost $700,000 to wife of FBI agent investigating her
claims.negative: Hillary Clinton didn't give almost $700,000 to wife of FBI agent investigating her
claims.negativePlain: Hillary Clinton didn’t give almost $700,000 to wife of FBI agent investigating her
claims.truth: The timeline is wrong and the connections are exaggerated
claims.truthPlain: The timeline is wrong and the connections are exaggerated
